SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Emissions from Lanfill gas use for bioelectricity production: electricity for blower + LFG conversion. Carreras-Sospedra et al. (2016): Assessment of the emissions and air quality impacts of biomass and biogas use in California
Original Units: CO2 lbs/ MMBTU of gas recovered
